edu.ycp.cs201.cards

Class Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ycp.cs201.cards.Selection

  • public class Selection
extends java.lang.Object
    A Selection object represents one or more cards that the user wants to move. A Location indicates the source of the moved cards (e.g., the main deck or a tableau pile). An ArrayList of Cards stores references to the cards that the user wants to move.
